Najel nočnega stražarja
Harry Styles na vrata spalnice namestil dodatno ključavnico. Ko je brezdomcu ponudil hrano, ga je ta začel zalezovati.
01 Nov 2019, 09:22 by T. P.



guliver/cover imagesHarry Styles je trepetal za svojo varnost. FOTO: guliver/cover images



instagramNiti v domači spalnici se ni več počutil varno. FOTO: instagram



instagramZadnje mesece se je nenehno oziral čez rame. FOTO: instagram



Pablo je bivakiral na ulici blizu zvezdnikovega doma.



guliver/cover imagesSočutje se mu je maščevalo. FOTO: guliver/cover images


Dobrota je sirota, je dodobra spoznal Harry Styles, nekdanji član fantovske glasbene skupine One direction, ki se je ustavil, ko je v deževni noči zagledal mladega moškega drgetati na ulici. V njem je videl nekoga, ki mu je sreča obrnila hrbet, in mu je hotel s toplim obrokom ali denarjem za hotelsko sobo, da se vsaj malce ogreje in naspi, pomagati premostiti vsaj eno težko noč.


Sočutje se mu je maščevalo. FOTO: guliver/cover imagesguliver/cover images

Nevedoč, da je Pablo Tarazaga-Orero načrtno bivakiral na ulici le lučaj od njegovega doma. In pevcu, ko mu je ta ponudil roko pomoči, življenje spremenil v nočno moro strahu in tesnobe.Začelo se je z dobroto in sočutjem. »Pablo je dlje spal na ulici blizu mojega doma. Neke noči, na poti domov, sem ga zagledal, kako spi na avtobusni postaji. Zasmilil se mi je, nekdo tako mlad, ki nima strehe na glavo. Zunaj pa mraz in dež. Ustavil sem avto in mu ponudil denar za hotel in obrok, a mi je odvrnil, da denarja zaradi verskih razlogov ne more sprejeti,« se prvega stika z mladim brezdomcem spominja Harry. Misel nanj mu ni dala spati, zato je naslednji dan v veganski restavraciji zanj kupil dva topla sendviča, solato, mafin in mu vrečko s hrano izročil iz avta.


Zadnje mesece se je nenehno oziral čez rame. FOTO: instagraminstagram

»Hrano je sprejel in me vprašal, ali bi šel z njim v restavracijo. Precej čudaško. A njegov izraz na obrazu je bil tisti, zaradi katerega sem se nenadoma počutil neprijetno.« Precej upravičeno, saj po tistem skoraj ni več mogel od doma, ne da bi se spotaknil ob Pabla. Videval ga je tako rekoč vsak dan, najmanj petkrat na teden.»Večkrat tedensko sem nanj naletel v baru, v katerega zahajam. Vedno je prišel le minutko ali dve za mano, sedel v mojem zornem kotu in me opazoval. Vedno sam. Začelo se mi je dozdevati, da me zalezuje, nič več se nisem počutil prijetno ali sproščeno.« To pa je bil komaj začetek. V naslednjih tednih mu je Tarazaga-Orero pod vrata doma potiskal sporočila in bankovce, v drugem trenutku pa mu pošiljal sporočila, naj mu na njegov račun – napisal mu je podatke svojega bančnega računa – nakaže kaj denarja.


Niti v domači spalnici se ni več počutil varno. FOTO: instagraminstagram

»Niti doma se nisem več počutil varno.« Strah in tesnoba sta postala del pevčevega vsakdana, zato si je v strahu za lastno varnost na vrata namestil dodatne ključavnice, eno celo na vrata svoje spalnice, na svojo plačilno listo pa dodal osebnega stražarja, da ga je varoval prek noči. »S tovrstnim vedenjem se še nikoli prej nisem srečal,« ob tem, da je iz dneva v dan postajalo hujše. Pablo naj bi zvezdnikovemu sosedu Rafaelu Krezeszewsmu zaupal, da »je Harry njegova sorodna duša, da ga duhovno ščiti in da ima vizijo prihodnosti, v kateri bosta skupaj bivala na Irskem«. Kmalu pa ni ostajal več samo pri besedah, pač pa naj bi, bilo je maja, tarčo svoje obsedenosti poskušal zagrabiti med tekom po bližnjem parku. Kar je bila kapljica čez rob, zaradi katere se je zvezdnik obrnil na policijo.»Želim si, da bi si poiskal pomoč, ki jo očitno potrebuje, a sam pri tem ne želim imeti nobenega opravka. Nikakršnih stikov nočem imeti s Tarazaga-Orerom, želim si le, da bi se doma spet počutil varno.«
Na mimoidoče na ulici ne gleda več enako, vsakdo je potencialna grožnja.
Predstavniki zakona so njegovemu zalezovalcu stopili na prste, a niti po njegovi aretaciji se Styles ni počutil varnega. Izkušnja je korenito vplivala nanj. Ne le da je poostril varnost doma, »večkrat se ujamem, da tuhtam, katere so šibke točke morebitnega vdora pri meni doma. In če koga na ulici vidim več kot enkrat, se v meni prižge alarm,« priznava Harry.Sodnik ​je Pabla Tarazaga-Orero v tem tednu spoznal za krivega zalezovanja, kakšno kazen mu bo prisodil, bo znano 21. oktobra.

Hired a night guard
Harry Styles installed an extra lock on the bedroom door. When he offered food to the homeless man, he started stalking him.
01 Nov 2019, 09:22 by T.P.



gulliver / cover imagesHarry Styles trembled for his safety. PHOTO: gulliver / cover images



instagramNo more in the home bedroom felt safe. PHOTO: instagram



instagramHe has been constantly looking over his shoulder for the past few months. PHOTO: instagram



Pablo bivouacked on the street near the star's home.



gulliver / cover imagesHe sympathized with his revenge. PHOTO: gulliver / cover images


Goodness is an orphan, Harry Styles, a former member of the boy band One Direction, came to his senses, stopping to see a young man shiver in the street on a rainy night. He saw someone with luck turning his back on him and wanted to help him bridge at least one good night with a warm meal or money for a hotel room to warm up and get some sleep at least.


His compassion avenged. PHOTO: gulliver / cover imagesguliver / cover images

Not knowing that Pablo Tarazaga-Orero had deliberately bivouaced on the street just a block from his home. And when the singer offered him a helping hand, he turned his life into a nightmare of fear and anxiety. It began with kindness and compassion. “Pablo slept longer on the street near my home. One night, on the way home, I saw him sleeping at the bus stop. He made me laugh, someone so young with no roof on his head. Outside, it's cold and rain. I stopped the car and offered him money for a hotel and a meal, but he replied that he couldn't accept the money for religious reasons, "Harry remembers the first contact with a young homeless man. He didn't think of sleeping for him, so the next day at a vegan restaurant he bought him two warm sandwiches, a salad, a muffin and handed him a bag of food from his car.


For the past few months, he has been constantly looking over his shoulder. PHOTO: instagraminstagram

“He accepted the food and asked me if I would go to a restaurant with him. Pretty weird. But his expression on my face was one that suddenly made me feel uncomfortable. ”Quite rightly, since after that he was almost unable to leave home without tripping over Pablo. He saw him saying that every day, at least five times a week. "I came across him several times a week at the bar I go to. He always came just a minute or two behind me, sitting in my corner and watching me. I always am. It started to feel like he was stalking me, I no longer felt comfortable or relaxed. ”That was hardly the beginning. In the following weeks, Tarazaga-Orero was pushing messages and banknotes under the door of the home, sending him messages at another time to send him some money into his account - he had written him his bank account information.


Even in the home bedroom, he no longer felt safe. PHOTO: instagraminstagram

“I didn't feel safe at home anymore.” Fear and anxiety became part of the singer's daily routine, so he, in fear of his own safety, installed extra locks, one even on his bedroom door, and added a personal guard to his payroll, he was guarded overnight. "I've never encountered this type of behavior before," as it got worse day by day. Pablo is expected to confide in the star's neighbor, Rafael Krezeszewsm, that "Harry is his soulmate, to protect him spiritually, and to have a vision of a future where they will reside together in Ireland." Soon he was no longer just talking, but in May he was trying to grab the target of his obsession while running around a nearby park. Which was a drop over the edge that made the superstar turn to the police. "I want him to seek the help he clearly needs, but I have nothing to do with it myself. I don't want to have any contact with Tarazaga-Orero, I just want to feel safe at home again. "
Passers-by on the street no longer look the same, everyone is a potential threat.
Law enforcement officials got his stalker on his toes, but even after his arrest, Styles didn't feel safe. The experience has profoundly influenced him. Not only did he tighten his security at home, "I find myself repeatedly weighing down what the weak points of a possible home invasion are. And if I see anyone on the street more than once, the alarm goes off in me, "Harry admits. The judge found Pablo Tarazaga-Orero guilty of stalking this week, what sentence he will be sentenced, he will know on October 21.
